Text: If you cannot explain how the gravity works, how can you explain me, how the universe works?
The new second season/series of How the Universe Works began airing on July 11, 2012 on The Science Channel, but no one seems to be sharing it. That's too bad. Thanks for the upload.

FYI, only episodes 2, 7, and 8 of this collection are narrated by Mike Rowe (of Dirty Jobs). The rest are narrated by Richard Lintern (a British chap), who is a bit weak in comparison.

FWIW, Mike Rowe is a MUCH more engaging narrator, but they are both 1000 times better than the narrator of Season 2. He was SO boring that I literally had to shut off the show only 1/3 of the way through to keep from snoozing off.
